div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 468 Čerpaev, Veliko Târnovo district, Bul- garia, 1957 Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 51 AR Alexander III: late post. tetradr. (at least 3 of Rhodes in good condition) Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 22 (1959), p. 363
